Metabarcoding/eDNA through Obitools

## Associated Tutorial

This workflows is part of the tutorial [Metabarcoding/eDNA through Obitools](https://training.galaxyproject.org/training-material/topics/ecology/tutorials/Obitools-metabarcoding/tutorial.html), available in the [GTN](https://training.galaxyproject.org)
